library(tidyverse)

header <- c( "chr", "start", "end", "count" )
df_kc_hg19 <-  read_delim(
  "~/qb25-answers/week1/hg19-kc-count.bed", col_names=header )
  
df_kc_hg16 <-  read_delim(
  "~/qb25-answers/week1/hg16-kc-count.bed", col_names=header )

df_combine<- bind_rows( hg19=df_kc_hg19, hg16=df_kc_hg16, .id="assembly" )

plot_combine <- ggplot(data = df_combine, aes(x=df_combine$start, y= df_combine$count,scales = "free", color= df_combine$assembly))+
  geom_line()+
  labs(x= "chromsome", y="count")+
  facet_wrap(. ~ df_combine$chr)

ggsave("~/Desktop/exercise2.png")
